EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents NORTH PARCEL

Institutional Controls for NORTH PARCEL include:

CA772PR - Proprietary Institutional Control

This institutional control is an environmental covenant, which includes the following land and groundwater use restrictions:

There shall be no use of the Property other than industrial use. Ground water beneath the Property shall not be extracted or used for potable or non-potable purposes, except for ground water monitored from monitoring wells. Owner shall have responsibility for the maintenance of the Asphalt Cap (area outlined in red).

The environmental covenant is available at:

Environmental Covenant

properties.Name: Aspahlt Cap
properties.PopupInfo:
International Paper

3400 Deepwater Terminal Rd
Richmond VA 23234

EPA ID#: VAD046979498

EPA web page for this facility

Area shown represents ASPHALT CAP

Engineering Controls Controls for ASPHALT CAP include:

CA770NG - Non-groundwater engineering control

This engineering control consists of an asphalt cap, curbs, gutters, and a concrete ditch.

Institutional Controls for ASPHALT CAP include:

CA772PR - Proprietary Institutional Control

This institutional control is an environmental covenant, which includes the following requirements for the ASPHALT CAP area:

Owner shall have responsibility to monitor, inspect, maintain and repair the Asphalt Cap (area outlined in red), including maiintaining the asphalt cap to prevent deterioration, performing repairs of any cracks, settlement, or separation due to weathering or heavy truck traffic use; and perform seal coating of the Asphalt Cap at least every five ( 5) years unless the inspections reveal that more frequent application is necessary. Owner shall inspect the Asphalt Cap on at least an annual basis, and provide a written report ofthe Asphalt Cap status to EPA and VADEQ within thirty (30) calendar days of the final inspection.

The environmental covenant is available at:

Environmental Covenant
